website_summaries.verdict: The 1,300 Pa of suction power is ideal for the routine cleaning of most households, while the wide brush design reduces snags, making this a good option for medium pile carpets.
pros: This model includes the popular BoostIQ cleaning technology and automatic recharge feature of other eufy models
While the suction power may not pick up uncommonly large messes, it's powerful enough to handle everyday cleaning
We love the wide-brush design meant to prevent tangles that can trap other robotic vacuums
cons: Some users report this model gets stuck easily on unfamiliar obstacles

website_summaries.verdict: A smart model with a slim build that does a good job tackling most cleaning tasks. Worth considering if you like its smart capabilities.
pros: Capable of detecting when more cleaning action is required to get a job done, and adjusts suction accordingly
Slim design fits well around and under objects
cons: Has the tendency to scatter debris on hard flooring when cleaning large messes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome robot vaccum
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. I compared a lot of WiFi robotic vacuums before i made up my mind, so glad I bought eufy. For me, 15C is so easy to use.I just need to fully charge the robot and press the start button, it will clean and vacuum the entire room by itself. 15C works quite well on the carpeted floor. It has powerful suction but really quiet that you won't even notice it is working. Eufyhome app is very user friendly, I can process it via my phone and choose different modes. I am amazed that 15C can climb high-pile carpet under Boost IQ mode. Overall, this is a very good WiFi vacuum for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Super John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome robot vacuum and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it 3 times and it does a great job! I wasn’t sure if it would find home after it travelled throughout the house, but it eventually just followed a wall all the way back to the charging doc. Its an upgrade from the 11s with its wifi capabilities. The only issue I had was setting up the wifi connection. It only works on a 2.4 Ghz network. I have a dual band router and I had to shut off the 5 Ghz band and then used the “manually connect” option in the Eufy home app to connect to my 2.4 Ghz signal.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: No Warrantee!
customer_reviews.text: Charging base failed after 2 months. Eufy WOULD NOT honor warrantee when purchased through Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lairian

customer_reviews.title: junk - just like most other say
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this as an xmas gift for my wife here on Amazon. almost exactly 4 months later, like a LOT of other review say it is just spinning in circles and shutting down. We cleaned it, wiped the sensors and really took care of it. It appears to have a planned lifespan of about 4 months. This company should be ashamed of themselves for ripping off consumers like this.
customer_reviews.author: Rene M Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: My review was just deleted so I'm not writing it all over again. I'm not thrilled with this robovac. It drops clumps of dog hair all over the floor and cleans the same "box" area over and over instead of moving around in a random pattern. It gets stuck under the fan in my house as well as the wood paneling on the floor, which is crazy. It's as if the doggone thing deliberately goes to the exact same spots and gets stuck on purpose instead of going in another direction or moving on. I bought it based off of Consumer Reports and other customer reviews but I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: AtekamT

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really want to keep it because I did a lot of research and this was supposed to be good, but it only cleans about 50% of my 2100 square feet house, gets lost to the charger, and gets stuck on almost everything. Had to return it. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a helicopter
customer_reviews.text: This product worked ok for the first 6 weeks. Then all of sudden, it sounded like a helicopter every time it ran. Extremely disappointed. This was a gift and now the support window from amazon is closed after 3 months. Eufy will not provide support because it is sold by Amazon. Extremely disappointed. Avoid this unit and stick to Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L. Coldren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the Robovac for around 10 months. It is used only once or twice a month and it is now not working at all. Despite a proper charge it will not run when removed from the charging station. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty side brush, battery lasted less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Only giving two stars because customer service was great. Our first RoboVac had a side brush quit working within a month of purchase. So we returned it and got a second one free and fast. The second one started having the same issue on the same side about 6 months in, we ONLY use this vacuumed on hardwood, and we've just lived with it's faulty side brush since. Now here we are, 11 months later and the battery is dying. The vac now cleans for about 30 minutes before returning home. Don't think it's even worth buying a new battery, just going to purchase a new vacuum from another brand. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: K Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: I might re-buy this vaccum....
customer_reviews.text: The 15C does a great job of cleaning up. I never had to sweep and I could always walk barefoot on my hardwood floors which is IDEAL! Although, the vacuum did bump into things a lot, it was kind of annoying. There was only one place in the house that it got stuck, but we just put paper bags in front of it so the Eufy wouldn't go there. I am returning it because I was hoping it would clean my rugs a bit better. I may still buy it again in the future, but maybe I can wait for a coupon. You should 100% buy this vacuum if you never want to sweep--ever again.
customer_reviews.author: TheBiologist

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Works with my Google home
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very quiet. I have two dogs afraid of my upright vacuum and they didn't seem to care much about this at all. It is working with my Google Home without any difficulty. App seems to work just fine, so does the remote but don't really plan on using it. It does have some trouble with my rug fringe but can usually get out of the situation on its own, it is fun to watch it figure things out. Scheduling function works well. Works on random pattern which seems to cover everywhere over the course of a few times. Awesome for pet owner always chasing dog hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LoVe My RoBoVac- Named him Jeeves
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever have to think about my floors. The are cleaned on schedule while I am at work and surprisingly even though I live alone and have no pets, his dustbin is filled with dust, hair and small debris every other day when he is done cleaning. I am so glad I bought this vac. He goes under the furniture and around the legs of the stools with ease. Has no trouble getting up on the area rugs. I used my PRIME points to purchase the vac so it was a double gift.
customer_reviews.author: Davylyn

customer_reviews.title: Great on hardwood or tile floors
customer_reviews.text: This little robo vac is a marvel. It picks up a lot of pet hair and daily dust from our hardwood and tile floors. Doesn’t do as well on our area rugs (high pile), but if the floors are dust-free, it’s easier to keep the rugs cleaner as well. I would buy this again. In fact, I’m planning on buying a second Eufy so I can separate the cleaning into two zones. This is one smart device I’m excited about recommending. Photo shows one days’ worth of dirt and cat hair. I empty the bin each time the vacuum cleans.
customer_reviews.author: Pirata.del.Caribe

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was very annoying when it worked. It would go over the same area over and over. But it only worked for a while and then quit. Now it leaves the base goes out about 4 inches and just sits there. Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: pjp7255

customer_reviews.title: Died within 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Dead I think 4 months w/ steady purple light, WTH? Ridiculous. Will file official complaint against Eufy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: WH310

customer_reviews.title: Buy a protection plan, it essentially died in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: When I got it for Christmas for my mom, it was awesome and worked great. After running for a few months a few times a week, it started to run super loud and suction essentially went away despite taking it apart and making sure nothing was stuck or clogged up. Wish I would have went with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Finch

customer_reviews.title: Our first robot vac
customer_reviews.text: This is our first robot vacuum purchase. We have a large sectional that sits about 3 inches above the floor. This Vacuum, my daughter named it "Pickles", goes right under it and cleans all the dust quite well. We did need to do a "pre-clean" underneath though as we found out that missing socks and dryer sheets will jamb up the vac. We have all hard surfaces in the main living area and kitchen and this does a really nice job of keeping the area clean. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Scott

customer_reviews.title: I was reluctant. You don’t have to be
customer_reviews.text: I always thought these things were stupid and for lazy people. But then my big “non-shedding ” dog started shedding. I had hair everywhere- especially in the corners and under things. Little hairy tumbleweeds were the bane of my existence. So I got this vacuum. We named her Eleanor. And she works. Really well too. I have a thick-pile rug I was worried about and she handles it pretty damn well, though I have to empty the bin more often - but that’s a good thing. Gotta day that this is one purchase I don’t regret.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Instead of vacuuming I now get to vacuum-sit
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this "smart" vacuum. It is slim, just slim enough to run under furniture only to wedge itself. I find myself constantly pulling this thing out from under furniture, or moving the couch to find The source of the annoying beeps. I finally decided to try and solve this by adding something to increase the vacuums height. Instead it seems to act out as if it knows I wasn't happy with it. I've attached a video that so you can all know what to expect. I'm a huge fan of Anker, but the 15c has caused me nothing but headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stewart Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is incredible
customer_reviews.text: The Eufy 15C works great. Six months in and no complaints so far. Very quiet and cleans very well. Can get stuck under all the small openings in between the dining table chair legs but what do you expect. Does a great job making it's way around the house and finding it's way back to it's base when it needs to charge. Remember there is a small canister so it needs to be emptied frequently. Has great suction for such a small profile but will not replace the deep cleaning of a full size vacuum. Overall I'd say this little guy kicks some serious tail and as a bonus the cat loves stalking it.
customer_reviews.author: Will M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed, given the reviews. It was ok for pet hair but not deep cleaning. It would get stuck a lot and repeatedly go over the same areas, so one room usually did not get done before the battery died. It did weird stuff like detach from the base and then return to the base, on its own????? It would stop in the middle of a job before the charge was gone, and I had to give it a boost to get it going again. I ended up returning it. I could Bachman my carpet with my regular vacuum in a fraction of the time it took the robovac.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Broken after less than 15 months.
customer_reviews.text: We were fairly happy with this Eufy, but the fan has now broken after less than 15 months of use. The warranty is only 12 months. I would expect this company to back up their products for longer and/or make them to last longer! We certainly can't buy a new vacuum every year. While it was working, it did a good job of picking up dirt but frequently got stuck under cabinets. It became a running joke to see how quickly the Eufy got stuck after its scheduled start time (10 minutes on a good day).
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 for Eugene
customer_reviews.text: EufyHome is great! I named mine Eugene. I have one cat and all hard wood floors, and this guy is amazing at keeping all her fluff under control. I love that he fits under the couch and TV stand! He does like to eat cords and cat toys, so you have to make sure his path is clear around the house. The app is easy to use and intuitive, and Eugene finds his own way home when he’s done or his battery is low. I’ve already recommended this product to several friends and family considering a robovac
customer_reviews.author: yelyah

customer_reviews.title: Not very good sucking power...
customer_reviews.text: I got this system and I was very excited for it. But to be honest it doesn’t pick up very well. The suction is not as strong as it should be. One thing I hated the most was the brushes would fall off even if it didn’t touch anything. They would come off and I would have to stop the vacuum and pop it back on. Only for it to fall off a few minutes later. Honestly I did not like this vacuum at all. For now I am going back to the vacuuming myself.
customer_reviews.author: Luis peralez

customer_reviews.title: The more I use it,the better I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I do not have it hooked up to my cell phone. Yes, I have to pile things in its way or shut doors where I don't want it to go. Yes, the dust cup is too small for my house and I vacuum it out once or twice during each run. Despite those inconveniences, this thing really cleans the floor and edges under the counters. It cleans under my stove and under the beds. It hasn't fallen down the stairs yet either. The cats find it fascinating.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  D,

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied; great support from Eufy
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and I'm happy with it. We had no problems getting support from Eufy after the gears in one of the side brush motors broke. (They didn't care that it was purchased through Amazon.) Since I was comfortable enough to take it apart to diagnose the issue, Eufy simply sent me a new motor that I easily replaced myself. No need to send it in for servicing. While I wish it was a bit tougher and could better handle getting caught on wires or rug fringes, it's really not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Love

customer_reviews.title: Eufy is cleaning machine that is not much of a homebody
customer_reviews.text: We have had Eufy in our life for about 3 weeks now and I must say, it’s been delightful having “him” around. With my previous relationship with Anker and their exceptional customer service, I knew Eufy would be satisfactory. We have a 4500 sq ft home and Eufy has picked up more hair than I would admit in public, the only issue is, he often can’t find his way home and eventually beeps loudly a few times stating that his battery is low and that he needs to be put on the charger for 5 hours...
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wood

customer_reviews.title: Better then a Roomba
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Eufy for my mom a couple Christmas’s ago and loved it. So I bought this one for myself. I absolutely love it! It’s so quiet and cleans great on hardwood floors! I don’t have carpet so I can’t really say how it does in there. My fiancé and I love this so much better then his moms Roomba. You can’t even have a conversation next to the person with the Roomba running but the Eufy is so quiet we can talk and watch tv without interruption.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Lake

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not reliable . Had an older Neato and wish I would have bought another one of those
customer_reviews.author: Michael McTaggart

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is a great vacuum at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This company stands behind its products It works great cleans great and it’s app work too I do not know if your cat can ride on it, I do not have a cat to test that out for you and your cat. Power point bullets: it works it’s easy to clean it really dose return to its base to charge after cleaning the house. Downside is it’s sneaky and breaks into the liquor cabinet
customer_reviews.author: 77 Ghosts

customer_reviews.title: My favorite gadget
customer_reviews.text: I love this vac. I purchased this a couple months ago and it’s really convenient. I have two dogs and a seven year old so pet hair and crumbs can become a problem. It has been perfect for maintaining my hardwood floors. I have not needed to sweep in a long time. For my carpets it’s great for maintaining after a good vacuuming day. When it vacuums toys it alerts you with a series of beeps. You can control it with your phone or with the controller. As for me I just turn it on and let it do it’s thing!
customer_reviews.author: B family

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Dumps dirt
customer_reviews.text: Picked up loose dog hairs and then dumped clumps of them all over the house. Container wasn't even close to being full. Wish it was used more before the return date so we could have realized this sooner. The previous Eufy version was great. Whatever they did to this one ruined it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Drop sensors are dirty warning stops vac every time!
customer_reviews.text: Every single time the vac runs it stops with a "Drop sensors are dirty" warning. I have thoroughly cleaned the sensors repeatedly, I tried putting electrical tape over the sensors, nothing has worked to resolve the issue. The vac runs for a while, 10min - 45min then just dies with the "Drop sensors are dirty". The unit does clean well. UPDATE - The drop sensor issue has almost gone away after a few weeks, I think it has to do with bright sunshine hitting the floor and/or dark spots on rug patterns. I changed the time of day it runs.
customer_reviews.author: David Ward

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE EUFY
customer_reviews.text: Eufy is the best. She cleans the floor daily, and I have never managed that in my life. My toddler loves her and screeches her name. It’s true that watching her can be maddening- don’t go there, go there, why did you turn around, why did you avoid that wall but not the leg of that table, get that spot, come on, get that spot. But if you turn her on and leave the house, or just ignore her, she gets the job done beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Simcha

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Only had this vacuum for a week it only worked for four days quit working after four days of course I’m returning this product this is not my first robotic vacuum my first one was A Bissell it worked wonderful for the first three years I have suffered And it did the job I will be going back to this one again I don’t suggest anybody to buy this product Eufy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how I survived without this. Easy Wi-Fi setup and programming. It took a few days to identify cords or spots that would catch, but all good now. It runs on a custom schedule and all we do is empty it daily. It runs for about 60 minutes at a time with a different pattern and takes about 3 hours to recharge. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: kcopcdoc

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: NOT WORTH IT. Worked well for first few months. After 8-10 months we started trouble shooting - cleaning, changing brushes, battery, etc. continued to not work. And ultimately stopped working completely. contacted the manufacturer but they could do nothing after 12 month warranty
customer_reviews.author: M. O. H.

customer_reviews.title: This model has a timer, a spot cleaner, and edge cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog and a cat and Eufy cleans the hardwood floors so well! In three months I have only used a regular vacuum once. I generally clean the filters once each week and have to empty the catch twice each week. It fits under most of my shelf and furniture and rarely gets caught on anything. My house is small and all hardwood or tile so that is something to keep in mind. I'm not sure how it would perform on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like this more. It does something’s well, getting too layer of crumbs/dirt from carpet, sweeping hard floors, scaring cats. However it doesn’t get deep into carpet (which I expected anyway), is difficult to get to work with Alexa, and seems like the red-headed step child of the Eufy robovac family because it is HARD to find online support for this model. Works ok, but is shell out a little more for an upgraded model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor lifespan
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleans very well, but doesn't last very long. My first one lasted 6 months, and was replaced under warranty. The warranty specifies that replacements are reconditioned. The replacement lasted just short of a year, and was not eligible for replacement under warranty. I have purchased a Roomba, which does a much poorer job of cleaning, but might last longer.
customer_reviews.author: The_Mad_Dr

customer_reviews.title: 1 month with "Maria" and I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: She's a "dumb" robot vacuum, so she doesn't know where she is and doesn't map out where she's going ---it's all random. This can be frustrating watching for 10 minutes while she tries to find the charging base 4 feet away. But whatever, the amount of dog hair and dirt she picks up more than makes up for it. I schedule her every other day to do a sweep. It's also cool to say "Alexa, tell robovac to start/go home/etc." but i wish I could call her by her name, not 'robovac'
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: You are not lazy purchasing this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: You are not lazy purchasing this. It’s amazing. I turn it on when I come home from work and let it run auto throughout the evening. It’s quiet so it’s not distracting and continues to keep my house clean while I relax and spend time with my kids. At first I felt that I could vacuum “quicker” (which is true) but it’s nice to know that the vacuum is cleaning my floors continually while I do other things.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy these for my daughter and daughter-in-law, not knowing how they would be received. When they opened their gifts I discovered they had both been wanting one, and the whole family was excited about receiving one. They both use them routinely and say they work very well. One has hard wood floors and the other has both carpet and linoleum with a dog. They say are easy to empty and both girls are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not bad for the price. It does "ok". If you have dogs and alot of fur shed I DO NOT recommend this product. This is not meant for heavy duty clean ups. I have 2 large dogs and white tile. This vacuum did very little to no clean up. If you're looking for a product to clean up small dust/ dirt on your floor perhaps this is the vacuum for you. Other then that I would spend a little extra on the pricier vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Alandria Franco

customer_reviews.title: It's quiet
customer_reviews.text: We replaced an old robovacuum that was obnoxiously loud. Working at home, there was never a good time for it to run. This one is great. Hard to hear it without music or the TV on. We can run this even when we are in the room. Works great too. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tj harbor

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for mother of 3
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can clear the floor and turn this on. It's a huge timesaver and works surprisingly well, even on carpet. There is no rhyme or reason to the track it makes, but it is relatively quiet. My 7yo can operate it and empty the tray as needed. I used to vacuum with my shark daily. Now I only pull that vacuum out once a month for a deeper clean.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a month and so far I'm pretty satisfied. It's not the smartest of robovacs, and sometimes struggles finding it's way back to its charging station, but it gets the job done and saves me from having to constantly vacuum 3 times a week. Would recommend for smaller spaces as batter charge lasts about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: LadyKube

customer_reviews.title: If it breaks your SOL through amazon.
customer_reviews.text: The adapter for the charging base broke. Contacted amazon and they said i needed to return it and buy a new one. All i need is a new adapter sent out. It's an annoying experience and makes the purchase not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shereffan Thackurdeen

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works well. It does a good job vacuuming, but I wouldn't say it's deep cleaning is 100%. Definitely helps lessen the load of vacuuming yourself and is compatible with Alexa if you set it up. I would either set the time and day in the app or say "Alexa run the vacuum" and it would start. However, mine after awhile started getting louder, making a rumbling noise, while it was cleaning so I emailed support. I sent a video of the vacuum running and how loud it was and was given a brand new vacuum. Julia helped me and always answered in a timely manner and it was not like pulling teeth to get a new vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Tatianna Addison

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first floor.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work decent on our wood floors. It much quieter than our roomba. Part of the reason I bought this was because it has smart sensors and it's supposed to prevent it from falling down the stairs. They dont work. It has taken a tumble a few times. They do prevent it from banging the baseboards, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kobylarek

customer_reviews.title: Works well for certain areas. Needs help with obstacles
customer_reviews.text: We have used this 10+ times and it does a good job in confined areas and with minimal obstacles in the way. Have to cover tassles on throw rugs and it struggles with getting the whole cloor clean. I need to do a manual vacumming every month. All in all will help for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley D Nordlund

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to our home!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace another robot vacuum, we love this one because you can schedule it to clean, change suction power levels, and it works great with Alexa. It does not scratch your floors and its good with sensing stairs, walls, etc... I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dario Idrovo

customer_reviews.title: Super cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Got this gift for my daughter and son in-law in Florida. They have hardwood floors throughout and love their new vacuum. Be careful if you have dogs though, one time the dog had an accident in the house when they were gone and the vacuum got all in it and spread it all over the place. Yuck!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Eufy RoboVac! It's amazing how well it can take care of messes, and it's such a great way to keep your floors in shape on a daily basis. Yes, you'll still want to do a deep clean once in a while, but having RoboVac do a pass of the floors each day really does a lot! Also, the Eufy customer service is excellent! I had an issue with ours and Sara at the Eufy Customer Service line assisted me promptly and was very quick to respond and follow up via email! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit but has issues finding base and virtual walls are not able to be purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This was my 40th birthday gift and first ever robotvac. It’s well made and quiet. Does an okay job of picking most dirt up. My only major issues are it seems to have so much trouble finding the base. It will wander aimlessly until I give up and just use the remote to get it back home. And there is no option to purchase the virtual wall strips anywhere. This is a huge con for me as I was excited to be able to schedule it to run when I’m not at home but if it won’t find the base to charge or gets stuck under the couch I may have to return it. Otherwise I absolutely love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Beth L.

customer_reviews.title: well this got terrible quickly
customer_reviews.text: Eufy was pretty OK for a while. good cleaner, resilient little guy. easy to maintain. it had always been loud -- louder than other robo-vacs I'd heard. but lately, within the past 2 months, Eufy is unbearably loud. there's obviously some kind of malfunction inside. it's not cleaning half as well as it used to, and seriously, it's hard to overstate the noise. like a garbage truck in my living room. the thing is, we haven't had this thing for very long. maybe a year? is this what i'm to expect from amazon products? a year in, major malfunctions that prevent me from using it? definitely do not buy this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A. Robles

customer_reviews.title: Best all round!!
customer_reviews.text: excellent machine for value. excellent refill parts are economical and Eufy is really easy to clean. I highly recommend this to anyone! also, this works with Google assistant and home, under the smart integrations tab on the menu...
customer_reviews.author: K. Lavette McBride

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this vacume. We have a dog and lots of girls with hair. When we use it we do have to clean hair out of the brush mid cycle. But it works around our furniture and even goes over our Persian rugs. Under our couches have never looked better. I love how it connects to my phone. I loved the sale price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died 6 months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Firstly would not connect to wifi, but worked well for cleaning my hardwood abd carpetted areas. Died after less than 6 months of light usage.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Anne 🌼Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: works well, good company.
customer_reviews.text: During quarantine my goovy was such nice, sweet company. Every day at four he came to say hi. So as a thank you for his emotional support, I bought him a buddy. Meet eufy! (Picks up really well on carpet when I tested her. Still need to fully set up)
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Beam

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT do a good job
customer_reviews.text: Have laminate wood floors . Followed all instructions and watched vacuum going back-and-forth this weekend. Had nothing On the floor that would prevent us from doing his job because of the fan under the vacuum, if you’ on the floor that would prevent us from doing his job because of the fan under the vacuum, if blow the dirt away from the vacuum before if it goes over it and therefore only picks a small fraction of any dirt etc
customer_reviews.author: Carrinne

customer_reviews.title: No more wild west
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 dogs and 3 kids. I had to sweep every day or I would end up with dog hair and dirt tumbleweeds rolling though my house like the wild west. This is amazing. I have it programmed to go off every night at midnight to clean the house. It is quiet and does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: karisa Haase

customer_reviews.title: Quiet but annoying
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter than Roomba. The big problem is that it developed an annoying front bumper beep after awhile that nothing seems to fix. Magnetic strips do not keep it from going under furniture, and so it gets stuck more than when you have a virtual wall feature. Not sure I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor W

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend- did not last but 15 months
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend. I was VERY excited about getting this. I was impressed with the amount of dust it picked up in the first couple of uses. I use it twice a week if that. This only lasted us 15 months before it stopped working completely. The wheels get stuck and it just goes in a circle and then eventually stops. The same problem happened in March, but I wrote customer service and they gave a suggestion to fix it and it worked. Same thing happened less than 4 months later and the repair does not work and now it is out of warranty. I only run it twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Chaddy Waddy

customer_reviews.title: Great robot for the cost
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great Roomba substitute. It’s so good we call it the Foomba. One of our rugs has a lot of pile, and this definitely sucks up everything on it. The journey it chooses to take every time we turn it on is different, and its destination is always different too. We like that we can control it’s movements if we do need to vacuum up a quick spot, and our cat isn’t 100% terrified. It works well with Alexa, and the phone app is handy too. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working just over 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working at 34 days, but Amazon doesn’t take returns after 30 days. I bought this using a payment agreement so I’m still paying for something that doesn’t even work. Disappointed because this was a splurge for our family. Loved it for the first month while it worked!
customer_reviews.author: J Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Overall solid product
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. I just couldn’t keep up with all of the cat hair on our hard wood floors, but this fella picks up most of it. Pretty quiet compared to others on the market. Only issue I’ve seen is that it sometimes gets hung up in one area and has to manually be moved to another part of the house to clean. Wish we would have bought a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Addison

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is tuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! This vacuum is tuff!! Husband dropped his large metal travel cup full of coffee on the vacuum. The top is glass so it shattered the top cover. He looked for a replacement part and couldn’t find one. Luckily for him he has a laser that cuts acrylic so he made a new top for it. The vacuum still runs like it’s brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Great low profile vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum that I've been using for about 8 months. I chose this due to its low profile so it could reach beneath my furniture. I have hardwood floors and two dogs that shed constantly, this vac does wonders keeping up with their hair. After about 6 months I ran into an issue with a stripped side brush motor. Tech support was great and very responsive. A replacement motor was sent out relatively quickly given the current pandemic. I will definitely be buying another EUFY vacuum to keep on a different floor of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Great robotic vacuum... so far, very impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my Eufy! She definitely does the job! We have two... sometimes three pets and I put her to work every morning! She takes care of all the dust and pet hairs! I’m grateful! And What a great price she was on Cyber Monday . I’m still figuring out how to use my phone to control her movements, but isn’t that always the issue? Trying to make things do you exactly what you desire? Oh well, I’ll figure it out. We’re moving into an RV ( full-time) so I’ll try to keep everyone updated on our progress and Eufys performance.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This unit was nice and quite. We were nervous at first on how quite it was, because our previous "Bob" cleaner, was really loud. Integrated with Alexa, but Alex had a hard time for us. Could be user-error, so my wife just opts for activating our new vacuum manually.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Bustos

customer_reviews.title: Completely stopped working after six months
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum worked great for the first few months, I couldn't be happier. However, after about five months it completely stopped working. All of the brush rollers kept saying they were stuck even though we had just cleaned them. It started making HORRIBLE noises every time it started. We then replaced the brush roller and then it wouldn't connect to wifi, would stop working within a few minutes of turning it on. It would stop in the middle of our concrete floors saying that it was "stuck" because the sensors stopped working. It was great while it lasted but it wasn't worth the $200 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My Eufy works like a charm. Cleans very well. I always thought my home was very clean. I vacuum a couple times a week at minimum. After receiving my Eufy and setting it up I was shocked at the amount of dust and dirt it was still able to pick up. Very satisfied with the product and have recommended it to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Centurion83

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: i had previous robot vacuum and it was always getting stuck and bumping and grinding on corners and walls, the eufy glides nicely along not needlessly banging into walls and corners , it knows when its next to a wall and goes straight, it knows when to turn before it hits something. just keep cords picked up they cannot detect them and they seem to search them out and go straight for them there cords.
customer_reviews.author: william nienke

customer_reviews.title: Small capacity container doesn’t fit much.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you are better off buying a shark vacuum. This thing seemed cool at first but it just couldn’t Get the job done. It literally got stuck in the same spot almost everyday. The container is super small so don’t buy this if you have a dog that sheds.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Great little helper
customer_reviews.text: I love my Eufy. I call him Goofy because of his random moves. Let him loose in a small area (one room at a time) and he will collect lots of dirt. He has trouble negotiating some obstacles, e.g. he gets stuck on the mat under my exercise machine. But my place is a lot cleaner now, as I am learning his limitations.
customer_reviews.author: B. Erbe

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog hair but loud
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on April 29, 2019. Four months after using, it has begun to make a really loud vibration noise. The suction still works, but the noise is bothersome. I clean the vacuum after daily use. I emailed the company. I hope this is an easy fix because it’s super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: KeithD

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The eufy has performed well for the last year. The alexa integration has been very good, but we really don't use that feature much. We bought two more Eufy vacuums but we went with the cheaper non-wifi models for our additional 2 vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a robot vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The 15C is a great unit. We have only had it for a week, but have been very happy with how quiet it is. In addition, we think we are getting close to the advertised 100 minutes of cleaning time before it automatically goes back to find the charger. Very happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome on hardwood and low rugs. Not good for plush rugs
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for hard wood floors and low carpets/rugs. It doesn’t work very well for very plush or shaggy rugs. I was pleasantly surprised and impressed at how much it was able to pick up. I run It almost every day and it keeps the house clean effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Rui

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first eufy so much that I bought this one as a gift for my sister. Shes got four kids and 3 of them under 5 so she never has time to vacuum. After set up you just let it do its work and every once in a while you clean the box. The first few times you use it you should clean it out because it picks up a shocking amount the first time. Its incredibly smart. It pushes small things around and work around big things and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Phil C.

customer_reviews.title: Wish we bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! As a dog owner with wood floors, we would need to vacuum multiple times a day to keep the floor clean. We deploy eufy once or twice a day and it is awesome. Always surprised by the amount of hair and dirt it picks up day after day. We wish we bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Little Guy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. Run it every day and it solves the problem of scattered cat litter on my hard floors. Easy to maintain and replacement filters/brushes are easy to get and inexpensive. I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: S. Novak

customer_reviews.title: This performes much better then my Rumba-
customer_reviews.text: The low profile gets under more places. I can’t believe how quiet it is! I have 95%hardwood floors but it even cleans my area rugs really well. Easy to use the app (unlike roomba) I am very happy with my purchase from the TREASURE TRUCK 💕💕
customer_reviews.author: THaberle

customer_reviews.title: Excelent ivacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent vacuum cleaner, I love it, it is my first experience with one of these, but I love it, it cleans very well and removes dust very well.
customer_reviews.author: Asulitanet

customer_reviews.title: It does its job well !
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I run this thing three times a day in a large area. . It always comes back with a near full load.......lots of dust, bugs and of course a ton of dog hair. For a inexpensive to mid price range robot I think it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Zorn

customer_reviews.title: My house burned to the ground.
customer_reviews.text: My house burned to the ground. She’s one of the first things I replaced. Yes there are bigger and more complicated. But for the money it does a great job. I run it every day and the amount of yellow lab hair it picks up is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Battery longevity not good
customer_reviews.text: Overall love it, however the battery life span is horrible! Have had it since only August, it runs on bare floors only, I clean it daily and the battery barely lasts an hour before it needs to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne E

customer_reviews.title: Eufy may not sync properly with app and wifi until the robot is fully charged.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Eufy for my new apartment. Its a little under 1000 sq ft (including bathroom which i dont send eufy into) and the robovac manages the entire apartment every auto clean before running out of battery. Its climbing feature has gotten it stuck on one of my chairs a few times but after a minor alteration works great. Its edge and wall detects work well too. The suction power is impressive. Significantly stronger than my relatives 5 yr old roomba. I really don't need a normal vacuume at all with eufy and a broom.
customer_reviews.author: breaklance

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This machine does what I want it to do. Pick up the dog hair and stuff off of my carpet and floors on a daily basis. This has kept my carpet looking great regardless of the number of people or pets. The wheel stuck about a month out of warranty and the company helped me figure out the problem and sent me the new part along with a video of how to install it. I do like this vac.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne W.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Seriously a life saver. With a baby crawling and two dogs shedding this picks up the hair so well! Not a deep clean but if you run it every day or every other with dogs no need to deep clean often. Goes from hardwood to rugs easily and cleans all areas great
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sell

customer_reviews.title: made too much noise--customer service solved my problem
customer_reviews.text: After 10 months my unit started making too much noise. I contacted Eufy customer service. They were fabulous. They helped my trouble shoot my issue, then sent me a new roller brush to solve the problem. It is once again quiet and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Morse

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This little unit does a fantastic job. I have multiple cats and dogs in my home so there is a lot of hair and dander. I let this unit do its job and find that my wood floors look like I have just hard core cleaned them. Love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Operate
customer_reviews.text: I have this on a floor in the house that is not used regularly. It is very convenient to schedule or use with the app. Would be nice to see them make a model where you do not have to empty the bin after each use. Have only used it for a couple weeks now but like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: MSshopper

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life!?!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second robot vacuum and has exceeded my expectations for such a low cost. A lot quieter and faster than my last one. I've just had it a week but the only thing I wish it had was boundary strips but I can do without. And so far great support from Eufy when I asked them a question. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have purchased 4 of them so far. The last one being a gift. Amazed how much fine dirt they pick up. Easy to clean and operate. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gould

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: We are so in love with this robovac ever since we took it out of the box. Our floors have never been so clean and we live in a house with all shiny white tile! I can not believe we waited this long to buy one. If you haven't gotten one and are debating it...just do it! This one cleans under everything. Our dog isn't bothered by it or our 2 year old. Our family has given it a name even. We are thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Barcelo

customer_reviews.title: Depenable
customer_reviews.text: We named ours R2D2, and he just works. Cleans anytime you need. No complaints doesn't want breaks just gets the job done. This thing never stops. Gonna buy a second one. Just so I can have one up and down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and well built
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a supplement between vacuuming. Seems to get happy wrapped around it and closed but not bad. Has fallen down the stairs but continues to work. Very well built. Also it's extremely quiet which is a bonus. Comparing to friends Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Just a bad product
customer_reviews.text: Bin fills up in a day, gets stuck everywhere, randomly turns off, and now a bearing or something broke because it sounds like a jet engine. Really just a bad product
customer_reviews.author: james ignatius

product_meta.title: eufy by Anker, BoostIQ RoboVac 15C, Wi-Fi, Upgraded, Super-Thin, 1300Pa Strong Suction, Quiet, Self-Charging Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, Cleans Hard Floors to Medium-Pile Carpets
product_meta.description: RoboVac 15C -The Super-Slim and Wi-Fi-Connected RoboVac is packed with BoostIQ technology and up to 1300Pa of suction power to ensure your floors and carpets are clear of all dirt dust and crumbs For Optimal Use Use on low-pile carpet tile laminate and hardwood floors Not suitable for high-pile carpet Move cables out of the way to avoid entanglement Note *Compared to previous eufy RoboVac models
feature_bullets: All-New RoboVac: Wi-Fi-equipped and re-engineered to be the slimmest* RoboVac (2.85'') but with increased suction to 1300Pa.
BoostIQ Technology: Automatically increases suction power within 1.5 seconds when extra vacuuming strength is needed to get the best clean.
High-Capacity Li-ion Battery: Delivers up to 100 minutes** of constant, powerful suction.

Premium Features: Anti-scratch tempered glass-top cover for protection, infrared-sensor for evading obstacles, and drop-sensing tech to avoid falls. Automatically recharges so it's always ready to clean.

What You Get: RoboVac 15C, remote control (2 AAA batteries included), charging base, AC power adapter, cleaning tool, extra set of high-performance filters, 4 side brushes, 5 cable ties, welcome guide and our worry-free 12-month warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,076 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
